name: Break The Disco
description:
Change the wavelength of the ball to match the colour of the Bricks to break them.

Photosensitive Seizure Warning!
This game contains flashing lights. Viewer discretion is advised.

(Note: Download the Windows version if browser version lags/crashes)

Shoot Ball / Change Ball Wavelength
(Cycles through Red, Green and Blue)W / Up / SpaceReset Ball to PaddleS / DownMove Paddle LeftA / LeftMove Paddle RightD / RightRestartR

Made for TriJam #92
Theme: Waves of Light

Made by SmoothProcess & JafCraze
